title: Singapore Robertson Quay Riverfront with Daily Breakfast, Club Lounge Access & Nightly Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
All of the garden city's spoils are within reach at this riverfront five-star hotel in Robertson Quay, Singapore's bountiful heritage and arts district.

A short drive from Orchard Road, Marina Bay Sands and minutes from the centre of blooming Singapore city, this ultra-modern hotel couldn't be better placed for exploration, but with a wealth of exceptional facilities onsite, there are plenty of reasons to stay. Explore international gastronomy across five restaurants and bars including the riverfront Italian ristorante, a Japanese fine dining spot, a New York-inspired steakhouse and a cocktail bar with tea-infused tipples.

Enjoy Singapore's year-round sun with a dip in the pool, relieve stress in the fitness centre and journey further into the sprawling cityscape with recommendations from Chief Concierge Hafizâ€™s team. Discover lesser-known gems, botanical gardens, national galleries and parklands, all at your fingertips.
